hook.text: Kim Scott's boss told her: your presentation was unclear. It stung. It was also the most helpful thing anyone said.

buildup.text: Most workplaces are either brutally honest or politely dishonest. Neither works.

discovery.text: Radical candor: care personally and challenge directly. Both at the same time, not either-or.

twist.text: Caring without challenging is ruinous empathy. Challenging without caring is obnoxious aggression.

climax.text: Show you care first. Then be direct about what needs to change. That combination builds trust.

punchline.text: Care and challenge. That's the whole framework.

quiz.question: What is radical candor?
options: Caring personally and challenging directly at the same time
Being brutally honest without regard for feelings
Avoiding all criticism to maintain positive relationships
